com.ctrlaltelite.pos.gui

Class SalesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ctrlaltelite.pos.gui.SalesController

  • public class SalesController
extends Object
    Controller class for handling sales data visualization in the POS system. Manages the sales line chart, date pickers for selecting the date range, and displays item sales in a list.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      private javafx.scene.control.DatePicker startDatePicker

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Initializes the controller class. Automatically called after the FXML file has been loaded. Sets up stylesheets, clears existing data from the line chart, and sets up event handlers for the date pickers.

      • exitFrame

        private void exitFrame(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Handles the action of exiting the current frame and switching back to the Manager Landing page.
        Parameters:
        event - The action event triggered by the user.

      • validateAndFetchData

        private void validateAndFetchData()
        Validates the selected date range from the date pickers. Ensures that both dates are selected and that the start date is not after the end date. If valid, it fetches the data for the given date range.

      • fetchData

        private void fetchData(LocalDate startDate,
                       LocalDate endDate)
        Fetches sales data from the database for the specified date range. Updates the line chart with total sales per day and displays item sales in the VBox.
        Parameters:
        startDate - The start date of the sales data.
        endDate - The end date of the sales data.
